description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to produce nets from their body. The user can create sticky nets as a base ability, and can create specialized nets by ingesting materials, giving them properties of the consumed substance such as metal, fire, or boiling water.

users.circumstances: Largo is already a user when first introduced in the Little East Blue arc

abilityReveals.description: Largo produces sticky web-like nets at an opponent. This is the most basic type of net that Largo can produce, and he does not need to consume anything to create it.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Largo uses this ability when demonstrating his Devil Fruit powers to Luffy and the Straw Hats.

abilityReveals.description: Largo eats metal, then fires the metal from his hands in the form of a barbed wire net. This demonstrates the fruit's ability to create material-based nets.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Largo uses this technique to trap Luffy in a dangerous spiked net at the end of the episode.

abilityReveals.description: Largo can transform his body into a net to trap opponents.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Mentioned as one of Largo's capabilities with the Ami Ami no Mi.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: High capture rate - Largo claims 120% capture success
strengths.description: The versatility and binding power of the nets makes them extremely effective for capturing opponents.
By consuming different materials, the user can create nets with various properties (metal, fire, water, etc.), making the ability highly versatile.

notes: This is an anime-only Devil Fruit created for the Little East Blue arc and does not appear in the manga or any canon One Piece material.
